tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS financial_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  transaction_type STRING,
  amount DECIMAL,
  category STRING,
  department STRING
)

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE cost_saving_opportunities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    opportunity_id VARCHAR(10),
    opportunity_description TEXT,
    amount_saved DECIMAL(10,2),
    date_identified DATE
);

CREATE TABLE resource_allocation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id VARCHAR(10),
    resource_name VARCHAR(50),
    allocation_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    allocation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE optimization_strategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id VARCHAR(10),
    strategy_description TEXT,
    implementation_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
    implementation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE financial_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);
